name: Sonali A4 Size Paper (65 GSM) 1 Rim
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from India. Sonali A4 Paper is a versatile and reliable high-quality paper designed to meet the diverse needs of businesses, students, and professionals. With a weight of 80 GSM, it offers a balance between durability and flexibility, making it suitable for various applications.
